name: Space Shooter (itch) (dronkowitz28)
description:
Welcome to my game called Space Shooter

How to Play

Press Start in Layout then to play and move: use arrow keys to move and press space to shoot

u can do a repeat shoot until the enemy ships are dead

to die yourself u have 2 options u can either let the ships try to kill the player or have the asteroids keep hitting u, u will lose 1 health per hit

the player and/or enemy ships will explode after dead
